alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Elbert and south central Arapahoe Counties through 745 AM MDT... At 700 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Ramah, or 28 miles west of Limon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Agate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
